Module it.polimi.ingsw.am52

Package it.polimi.ingsw.am52.model.cards

package it.polimi.ingsw.am52.model.cards
  • Class
    Description
    BlankCorner
    Immutable class that represents a visible card corner with no associated resource or item.
    Card
    The base class of all playing cards.
    CardCorner
    The base class of a visible card corner.
    CardFace
    The base class of a face of a playing card (Resource, Gold, or Starter cards).
    CardPoints
    The base class for an object ables to calculate the points that a card face gives, when the card is placed on the playing board.
    CardSide
    The side of the card face, front or back side.
    ConstantPoints
    Gives the player a constant number of points when the card is placed on the playing board.
    CornerLocation
    The location of a card corner on the card face.
    CornerPoints
    An object that calculates the gained points based on the number linked corners when the card is placed on the playing board.
    GoldCard
    The base class of all Gold cards.
    GoldFrontFace
    The base class of all front faces of Gold Cards.
    Item
    The available items in the game.
    ItemCorner
    Immutable class that represents a card corner with an associated item.
    ItemPoints
    Gives the player a number of points depending of the number visible items on the playing board.
    ItemsCounter
    Immutable class that maintains the count of all available items.
    ItemsProvider
    Any object that has items.
    Kingdom
    The kingdom of a card.
    KingdomBackFace
    The back face of a Kingdom card (Gold or Resource card).
    KingdomCard
    The base class of all Kingdom cards (Gold and Resource cards).
    KingdomCardFace
    The base class for all kingdom cards (Gold and Resource cards).
    KingdomColor
    Each kingdom has an associated color.
    Pluggable
    The attributes of any element that can be plugged to other elements inside the playing board.
    Resource
    The available game resources, each associated to Kingdom.
    ResourceCard
    The base class of all Resource cards.
    ResourceCorner
    Immutable class that represents a card corner with an associated resource.
    ResourceFrontFace
    The base class of all front faces of Resource Cards.
    ResourcesCounter
    Immutable class that maintains the count of all available resources.
    ResourcesProvider
    Any object that has resources.
    StarterCard
    A class that represents a Starter card.
    StarterCardBackFace
     
    StarterCardFace
    The base class for all Starter card faces.
    StarterCardFrontFace
    The front face of a Starter card.
